A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A lot of fancy special effects and some nice twists. However\, from a story perspective it was a very predictable movie. It's \"the middle movie\": you add the Jedi training\, the mentor (that doesn't want to be the mentor)\, the former hero dying to let the new generation have its place. We've seen that very same thing before. For me Star Wars is Luke Skywalker\, I went to see the move to reconnect with my childhood hero. Neither Episode 7 or 8 have established these new characters\, I couldn't care less about them. Now that Luke\, Han and Leia are dead there's no reason for me to see any of the future movies.
